description: Decorated in the same classic, elegant style as the famous Hermitage hotel in which it is located, this spacious restaurant offers an impressive menu of modern yet unfussy dishes alongside a selection of more traditional options. Grilled meats are cooked over the imposing charcoal grill in the evenings, while the fine views of the surrounding mountains and an excellent wine list add to the enjoyment of your dining experience.
facilitiesServices: Car park, Garden or park, Great view, Interesting wine list, Terrace, Wheelchair access
